content.name: login_content
content.content:
Clinical Messaging
Connecting you with colleagues.
Anytime. Anywhere.

data.subject: CM App Logs (v{{$store.schema.version}}-b{{$store.schema.buildInfo.build}})
data.body: Device logs for Clinical Messaging app '{{$store.schema.name}}'. App Version: '{{$store.schema.version}}'. Studio Build: '{{$store.schema.buildInfo.build}}'.

content.name: htmlAbout
content.content:
App Version: {{'$store.schema.version' | store}}
Build Number: {{'$store.preferences.appBuildNumber' | store}} - {{'$store.schema.buildInfo.build' | store}}
Server Version: Please login first

Clinical Messaging is a new breed of communication tool, designed and developed by CommonTime to facilitate multi-way conversations, broadcasts and alerts in high pressure environments.

CommonTime develop market leading communication apps that deliver practical innovation to organisations across the world. Backed by over 20 years of experience, our secure & reliable solutions are vital to mobilising enterprise and government communication.

priorities.name: High
priorities.userDescription: A High priority conversation will create a conversation that must be acknowledged by the recipients.

priorities.name: Urgent
priorities.userDescription: An Urgent conversation will immediately pop-up on the user's device.
